QuestData.Title: Speak With Spraggle
QuestData.Description: My good friend Spraggle has been fretting about something for some time now. I'd help her, but as you can see, I'm pretty comfortable right now.$b$bCould you check in with her and see what she needs?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Spraggle Frock in Marshal's Stand.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Spraggle Frock in Marshal's Stand.
